titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Our Arab American story [videorecording] : reverence, resourcefulness and respect ; an inspirational look into the world of our Arab American community.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Our Arab American story [videorecording] : reverence, resourcefulness and respect ; an inspirational look into the world of our Arab American community.

physdesc.physfacet: sd., col. with b&w sequences 1 booklet (52 p. : ill. ; 18 cm.)
physdesc.dimensions: 4 3/4 in. +; 011500; ca. 58 min. and ca. 17 min.

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Executive producer and director, Keith Famie ; producer and writer, Chris Kassel.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: disc 1. Our Arab American story -- disc 2. Arab American National Museum virtual tour.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Special features include additional scenes, Flavors of the Arab World event, production photo album, and personal insights.

archdesc.scopecontent: "This DVD contains an inspiring look at Arab American customs, holidays, and religious alliances, both Muslim and Christian throughout Detroit. It is an honest overview of the triumphs and tragedies of our Lebanese, Palestinian, Iraqi and Yemeni neighborhoods"--Container.
